text:
ISBN-13: 9780375760846.
ISBN-10: 0375760849.
Title: The Survivor.
Subtitle: Bill Clinton in the White House.
Authors: John F. Harris.
Categories: History.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=OBfYkABIj74C&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: A retrospective assessment of the Clinton presidency and its influence offers an illuminating analysis of the key personal, political, and policy decisions of the administration, assessing Bill Clinton's leadership style, his successes and failures, and the long-term implications of the Clinton presidency. Reprint. 40,000 first printing..
